name: Kaiju Strike
description:
Works best with Xbox controller:

  • Left Stick - Turn
  • A - Shoot
  • B- Camera to Enemy
  • X - Slow Down
  • Y - Speed Up

Alternate Mouse Keyboard:

  • WASD - Turn
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Right Mouse - Camera to Enemy
  • L_Shift - Slow Down
  • Space - Speed Up

No win or loss condition just fly and shoot.
